languages.text: "У тебя нет выбора! Лучше бы тебе быть послушн{mf|ым|ой} перед пристальным взором Его и не препятствовать процессу!" {n}Дознаватель злобно стискивает челюсти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "У тебя нет выбора, кроме подчинения! Лучше бы тебе быть послушн{mf|ым|ой} перед пристальным взором Его и не препятствовать трибуналу. И, возможно, только возможно, ты сможешь сохранить свою жалкую жизнь!" {n}Дознаватель злобно стискивает челюсть и возвращается к официальному тону.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "You have no choice in the matter! You would do well to submit meekly under His steadfast gaze and not obstruct the proceedings!" {n}The Interrogator grits his teeth viciously.{/n}
languages.original_text: "У тебя нет выбора! Лучше бы тебе быть послушн{mf|ым|ой} перед пристальным взором Его и не препятствовать процессу!" {n}Дознаватель злобно стискивает челюсти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You have no choice but to obey! You better behave under the steadfast gaze of the Exalted One and do not obstruct the court. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your pathetic life!" {n}The Interrogator clenches his jaw angrily and shoots you a look of abject hatred.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have no choice but to obey! You better behave under the steadfast gaze of the Exalted One and do not obstruct the court. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your pathetic life!" {n}The Interrogator clenches his jaw angrily and shoots you a look of abject hatred.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have no choice but to obey! You better behave under the steadfast gaze of the Exalted One and do not obstruct the court proceedings. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your pathetic life!" {n}The Interrogator clenches his jaw angrily and shoots you a look of abject hatred.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have no choice but to obey! You better behave under the steadfast gaze of the Exalted One and do not obstruct the court proceedings. And perhaps, only perhaps, it will be enough to preserve your pathetic life!" {n}The Interrogator clenches his jaw angrily and shoots you a look of abject hatred.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have no choice in the matter! You would do well to submit meekly under His steadfast gaze and not obstruct the proceedings!" {n}The Interrogator grits his teeth viciously.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have no choice in the matter! You would do well to submit meekly under His steadfast gaze and not obstruct the proceedings!" {n}The Interrogator grits his teeth viciously.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je crains que vous n'ayez pas le choix ! Vous seriez {mf|avisé|avisée} de vous soumettre à son implacable regard et de ne pas entraver la procédure ! » {n}L'interrogateur grince furieusement des dents.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have no choice in the matter! You would do well to submit meekly under His steadfast gaze and not obstruct the proceedings!" {n}The Interrogator grits his teeth viciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que vous n'ayez pas le choix ! Vous seriez {mf|avisé|avisée} de vous soumettre à son implacable regard et de ne pas entraver la procédure ! » {n}L'interrogateur grince furieusement des dents.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这件事情你别无选择！神皇在密切注视着你，你最好给我老实点，不要干扰这场审判！”{n}审讯官咬牙切齿道。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have no choice in the matter! You would do well to submit meekly under His steadfast gaze and not obstruct the proceedings!" {n}The Interrogator grits his teeth viciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这件事情你别无选择！神皇在密切注视着你，你最好给我老实点，不要干扰这场审判！”{n}审讯官咬牙切齿道。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたに選択の余地はない！主の揺るぎない眼差しのもとに大人しく服従し、手続きを妨害しないのが賢明だ！」{n}インテロゲイターは激しく歯を食いしばる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have no choice in the matter! You would do well to submit meekly under His steadfast gaze and not obstruct the proceedings!" {n}The Interrogator grits his teeth viciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたに選択の余地はない！主の揺るぎない眼差しのもとに大人しく服従し、手続きを妨害しないのが賢明だ！」{n}インテロゲイターは激しく歯を食いしばる。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt in dieser Angelegenheit keine Wahl! Ihr tätet gut daran, Euch widerspruchslos Seinem standhaften Blick zu fügen und das Verfahren nicht zu stören!" {n}Der Interrogator beißt die Zähne zusammen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have no choice in the matter! You would do well to submit meekly under His steadfast gaze and not obstruct the proceedings!" {n}The Interrogator grits his teeth viciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt keine andere Wahl, als zu gehorchen! Besser Ihr verhaltet Euch unter dem standhaften Blick des Erhabenen anständig und behindert länger nicht die Verhandlung. Und vielleicht, aber nur vielleicht, bleibt Euer erbärmliches Leben dann verschont!" {n}Der Interrogator presst wutentbrannt seinen Kiefer zusammen und blickt dich hasserfüllt an.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¡No tienes elección! ¡Harías bien en someterte a su mirada y no obstruir el proceso!». {n}Los dientes del Interrogador rechinan con furia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have no choice in the matter! You would do well to submit meekly under His steadfast gaze and not obstruct the proceedings!" {n}The Interrogator grits his teeth viciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡No tienes elección! ¡Harías bien en someterte a su mirada y no obstruir el proceso!». {n}Los dientes del Interrogador rechinan con furia.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bu konuda herhangi bir seçim şansın yok! O'nun sarsılmaz bakışları altında kaderini uysalca kabul et ve yargıya engel olma!" {n}Sorgucu, hırçın bir tavırla dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have no choice in the matter! You would do well to submit meekly under His steadfast gaze and not obstruct the proceedings!" {n}The Interrogator grits his teeth viciously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu konuda herhangi bir seçim şansın yok! O'nun sarsılmaz bakışları altında kaderini uysalca kabul et ve yargıya engel olma!" {n}Sorgucu hırçın bir tavırla dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
